definition: see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]

sentences.english: Days are coloured bubbles that float upon the surface of fathomless night.
sentences.chinese: 白昼是色彩缤纷的浮沫，于深邃的夜色中浮荡。

sentences.english: This nutrient superstar is found concentrated in the brightly colored skins and flesh of most foods in their natural form.
sentences.chinese: 该超级营养素在天然果蔬的色彩缤纷的皮肉中很多。

sentences.english: B：It's very colorful because many leaves of trees change colours in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 秋天是色彩缤纷的，因为各种树叶在秋天改变了颜色。

sentences.english: Just because of that years of changes with each new, vitality abundant, a riot of color .
sentences.chinese: 只因为那日新月异，生机盎然，色彩缤纷的岁月。

sentences.english: Finally, decorate the kites with colorful paintings.
sentences.chinese: 最后，以色彩缤纷的装饰画的风筝。

sentences.english: Tina wore a very colorful dress to school today.
sentences.chinese: 蒂娜今天穿着色彩缤纷的洋装到学校。

sentences.english: The interior space is more colorful, very eye-catching.
sentences.chinese: 而室内空间更是色彩缤纷，极为抓人眼球。

sentences.english: The colorful coral along the reefs hides tiny fish.
sentences.chinese: 色彩缤纷的珊瑚中躲藏着小鱼。

sentences.english: The long autumns are marked by colorful foliage.
sentences.chinese: 漫长的秋季以色彩缤纷的树叶闻名。

sentences.english: Experiment with something colorful or a playful animal print.
sentences.chinese: 比如一些色彩缤纷或者有趣动物图案的款式。

sentences.english: With the summer flowers in bloom, the valley took on every shade of colour.
sentences.chinese: 一到夏日花开时节，山谷里色彩缤纷。

definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
bright and multicolored/of rich variety/(fig.) dazzling/glitzy
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
